short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View customization data, preview and user-uploaded images for your Amazon orders on ShipStation orders and packing slips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of copying and pasting customization from your Amazon orders into ShipStation? Let CustomSync do it automatically!

Import custom data, preview and user images! View images on-screen and on packing slips.

CustomSync syncs your order customization data as orders come into ShipStation. This extension is only required if you want to view preview and user-uploaded images on-screen on ShipStation orders.

You can choose where the customization appears:
- Item description (item options)
- Customer notes
- Internal notes

Customization and images can be configured to display on packing slips too.

You can even exclude specific customization fields.
Choose what info is displayed by including or excluding:
Surface names
Labels
Font color
Item names
SKU
Quantity

Get your time back with CustomSync!
